name: Public Health Division -Tuberculosis Prevention & Treatment Program
short_desc: The Tuberculosis (TB) Control Program provides information and services pertaining the control and prevention of the spread of tuberculosis
description: The Tuberculosis (TB) Control Program provides information and services pertaining the control and prevention of the spread of tuberculosis. Testing - Part One, walk-In (no appointment necessary): Tuesday,  9-11, and 1-4; Reading the Test - Part Two: Drop-in (no appointment necessary), Thursday, 1-4. Call to make an appointment for diagnostic and treatment services 510-981-5350 Monday - Friday, 8- 5.
